TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Alvan_Adams, title = Alvan_Adams, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alvan_Adams} }

S.FORM: == Alvan Adams == u siwkay niza 7 a bulad 19 a demiad, 1954 a mihcan, tatama, miunduay. mimali i Amilika NBA. 1975 a mihcan, mapili' ni Fenghwangchen Cilal putiput i sakacacay silsil 4. u sulit nu Hulam 阿爾萬·亞當斯,為美國NBA NBA . u sulit nu Amilika Alvan Leigh Adams is an American retired professional basketball player. After starring at the University of Oklahoma, the 6'9" (2.06 m) power forward/center was selected by the Phoenix Suns with the 4th pick of the 1975 NBA draft. Adams was a rookie on a Suns team whose season included an improbable playoff run that took them all the way to the 1976 NBA Finals. In the same year, he was selected to play in the All-Star Game and won the NBA Rookie of the Year Award as well as being named to the All-NBA Rookie Team. Adams spent his entire career with the Suns and retired in 1988 as the second all-time Suns scorer with 13,910 career points. kakuniza kalunasulitan-sulu

== Alvan Adams == o siwkay niza 7 a bolad 19 a demiad, 1954 a mihcan, tatama, miondoay. mimali i Amilika NBA. 1975 a mihcan, mapili' ni Fenghwangchen Cilal potipot i sakacacay silsil 4. o solit no Holam 阿爾萬·亞當斯,為美國NBA NBA . o solit no Amilika Alvan Leigh Adams is an American retired professional basketball player. After starring at the University of Oklahoma, the 6'9" (2.06 m) power forward/center was selected by the Phoenix Sons with the 4th pick of the 1975 NBA draft. Adams was a rookie on a Sons team whose season incloded an improbable playoff ron that took them all the way to the 1976 NBA Finals. In the same year, he was selected to play in the All-Star Game and won the NBA Rookie of the Year Award as well as being named to the All-NBA Rookie Team. Adams spent his entire career with the Sons and retired in 1988 as the second all-time Sons scorer with 13,910 career points. kakoniza kalonasolitan-solo
